pages.about: About Tropical Rattan Home - Passion for Quality Rattan Furniture tropicalrattanhome@gmail.com +91 788 285 8449 Tropical Rattan Home Home About Us Faq 58GQ+V7W, Civic Center Area Rd, Civic Center Area, Sector 5, Bhilai, Chhattisgarh 490006, India About Tropical Rattan Home At Tropical Rattan Home, we are passionate about creating beautiful and unique furniture pieces made from high-quality rattan. Our goal is to provide our customers with exceptional service and quality products that will last for years to come. Our team is made up of skilled artisans who have years of experience working with rattan. We take pride in our commitment to quality craftsmanship and attention to detail, ensuring that each piece of furniture in our collection is built to last. We believe that furniture should not only be functional but also beautiful. That's why we offer a wide range of styles and designs to suit any taste and decor. From classic to contemporary, our collection has something for everyone. We are committed to sustainability and ethical practices, using only responsibly sourced materials and supporting local communities. We believe that by creating beautiful and sustainable furniture, we can make a positive impact on the world. Custom Orders Looking for something unique? We offer custom orders to help you create the perfect piece for your space. Delivery and Installation We offer delivery and installation services to ensure that your furniture arrives safely and is set up to your satisfaction. Maintenance and Repair We offer maintenance and repair services to keep your furniture looking beautiful for years to come. Trade Program We offer a trade program for designers and architects, providing exclusive discounts and personalized service. Showroom Visits Visit our showroom to see our collection in person and get personalized recommendations from our team. Customer Support Our dedicated customer support team is available to answer any questions and provide assistance with your order. Tropical Rattan Home Bringing the beauty of rattan to your home. Pages Home About Us Faq Additional Information Privacy Policy Terms of Use
pages.faq: Tropical Rattan Home - Frequently Asked Questions tropicalrattanhome@gmail.com +91 788 285 8449 Tropical Rattan Home Home About Us Faq 58GQ+V7W, Civic Center Area Rd, Civic Center Area, Sector 5, Bhilai, Chhattisgarh 490006, India Questions and answers What materials are used to make your rattan furniture? We use high-quality and sustainable rattan for our furniture, ensuring durability and a timeless look. Do you offer customization options for your furniture pieces? Yes, we offer custom orders to help you create the perfect piece for your space. What is the delivery time for your furniture? Delivery times may vary, but our team will provide you with an estimated delivery date when you place your order. Are your products suitable for outdoor use? Yes, we offer a range of furniture pieces that are designed for outdoor use, crafted from durable materials. Do you provide maintenance and repair services for your furniture? Yes, we offer maintenance and repair services to keep your furniture looking beautiful for years to come. What is the warranty on your furniture products? We offer a warranty on our furniture products, and the details may vary by item. Please contact us for specific information. Do you have a showroom where I can see your furniture in person? Yes, we have a showroom where you can view our collection and get personalized recommendations from our team. What payment methods do you accept? We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and other secure online payment options. Are your furniture pieces ethically sourced? Yes, we are committed to sustainability and ethical practices, using responsibly sourced materials and supporting local communities. Do you offer a trade program for designers and architects? Yes, we offer a trade program providing exclusive discounts and personalized service for design professionals. Tropical Rattan Home Bringing the beauty of rattan to your home. pages.index: Tropical Rattan Home - Discover the Beauty of Rattan Furniture tropicalrattanhome@gmail.com +91 788 285 8449 Tropical Rattan Home Home About Us Faq 58GQ+V7W, Civic Center Area Rd, Civic Center Area, Sector 5, Bhilai, Chhattisgarh 490006, India Welcome to Tropical Rattan Home Discover the Beauty of Rattan Furniture At Tropical Rattan Home, we specialize in creating beautiful and unique furniture pieces made from high-quality rattan. Our furniture is perfect for adding a touch of tropical style to any home or outdoor space. Our collection includes a wide range of rattan furniture pieces, from chairs and sofas to tables and accessories. Each piece is carefully crafted by skilled artisans to ensure the highest level of quality and durability. Explore our collection and discover the beauty of rattan furniture for yourself. Whether you're looking for a statement piece for your living room or a cozy outdoor seating area, we have something for everyone. Rattan Chairs Add a touch of tropical style to your home with our beautiful rattan chairs. Available in a variety of styles and colors, our chairs are perfect for any space. Rattan Sofas Create a cozy and inviting living room with our comfortable rattan sofas. Our sofas are available in a range of sizes and styles to suit any decor. Rattan Tables Complete your tropical-inspired space with our stylish rattan tables. From coffee tables to dining tables, we have a variety of options to choose from. Quality Craftsmanship Handcrafted Rattan Furniture for Your Home At Tropical Rattan Home, we take pride in our commitment to quality craftsmanship. Each piece of furniture in our collection is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring attention to detail and a superior finish. To learn more Explore Our Rattan Furniture Collection Rattan Dining Chair Handwoven for Comfort and Style 6,500 INR Order Rattan Coffee Table A Charming Addition to Your Living Room 8,200 INR Order Rattan Sofa Set Create a Relaxing Outdoor Oasis 24,900 INR Order Contact us I accept the Privacy Policy Send a message Tropical Rattan Home Bringing the beauty of rattan to your home.
